# MARKDOWN

## Linters

| [remark-lint (MARKDOWN)](markdown_remark_lint.md)                           | [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/remarkjs/remark-lint?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/remarkjs/remark-lint) ![formatter](https://shields.io/badge/-format-yellow)                           |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.md`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                      | Description                   | Default value |
|-------------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| MARKDOWN_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| MARKDOWN_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
